title: cmd/godoc: add link checker
body:
I wrote a hacky little link checker for godoc a couple weeks ago to crawl localhost
godoc and look at all local links and #fragments and verify they're good.  That's what I
used for sending off all the broken link CLs.

I'm attaching it here so I don't lose it, but it's not good clean or well-designed
enough to submit yet. It evolved very organically and rushed, racing time before I had
to shut down all portable electronics and return my tray table to its upright and stowed
position.

It'd be nice to run this in the future before releases, or periodically, to make sure we
don't break #fragments (like #hdr- ones) in the future.  I also think we'll eventually
need some JavaScript to redirect fragments if we change our sub heading text.
Attachments: 1. linkcheck.go (3068 bytes)
